Package hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.jvdraw.colors

Interface IColorProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JColorArea

    public interface IColorProvider
    Models an object containing a color property. The object is a subject and notifies all ColorChangeListener's about the color change.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addColorChangeListener​(ColorChangeListener l)
      Adds new ColorChangeListener.
      java.awt.Color getCurrentColor​()
      Returns the current color property.
      void removeColorChangeListener​(ColorChangeListener l)
      Removes the ColorChangeListener l.
